sentence.Network_en: Well - positioned web designers like Razorfish and Icon Medialab pounced on the opportunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 占有利位置的Razorfish、IconMediala等网络设计公司抓住了这个会.

sentence.Network_en: Razorfish brings with it a robust suite of tools and capabilities.
sentence.Network_cn: Razorfish将会带来它强大的工具和功能组合.

sentence.Network_en: Its largest unit , Avenue A | Razorfish, is an agency that designs websites and online - marketing campaigns.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司旗下最大的部门AvenueA|Razorfish是设计网站和在线市场活动的代理机构.

auth_sentence.content: The San Francisco office of New York-based Razorfish took a vote, and now Wednesdays are Dog Days.
auth_sentence.res_content: The San Francisco office of New York-based Razorfish took a vote, and now Wednesdays are Dog Days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The San Francisco office of New York-based Razorfish took a vote, and now Wednesdays are Dog Days.
